ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can butter beans, rinsed and drained
instructions: Mash butter beans in a large mixing bowl. Add ground turkey, egg white, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir until evenly mixed. Fold bread crumbs into mixture evenly.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.

Cook meatballs in hot oil until browned on all sides, 5 to 7 minutes. Cover the skillet and continue cooking until meatballs are no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
title: Quick Bean and Turkey Italian Meatballs
sentences: Mash butter beans in a large mixing bowl.
Add ground turkey, egg white, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir until evenly mixed.
Fold bread crumbs into mixture evenly.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook meatballs in hot oil until browned on all sides, 5 to 7 minutes.
Cover the skillet and continue cooking until meatballs are no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes more.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
